attributes.action: Make people more aware of the mental health behind teenagers
attributes.additional_details: As a group, we have taken surveys and 90% of teenagers in our school say they’re suffering from depression or are very stressed most of the time. Therefore, I defintley think action should be taken place and students should receive specific help.
attributes.background: I think that people should be made more aware of mental health behind teenagers as I feel as if it is important. They are going through a key stage of their lives, and need to have someone to help them and understand.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 

You might like to sign this petition instead:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/204268
